title: The Cat Who Said Cheese
description: Everything smells in Pickax when a killer invades the Great Food Explo. Luckily, Qwill is on the scene, his mustache twitching with suspicions. In her 18th Cat Who... mystery, best selling author Lilian Jackson Braun sends Qwill and the cats on a trail that will demand all their feline intuition and mustachioed insight.
author: Lilian Jackson Braun
